TopicTitle: Time to start on the forum.

Articles.Content: I played KSP for around 2 months now, i\'ve been here on the forum alot of times. The spacecraft exchange, How to and downloaded some mods. But now i wanna be a part of the forum, i wanna make some threads and make some posts. And before i forget it, thank you Squad for a great game!

Welcome to the Forums! I\'m sure you\'ll find us to be quite the lively bunch.

Welcome aboard and make your contributions!

Have Fun!

- Your Friendly Neighborhood Moderator,

Radion Spaceworks

If you have a spacecraft that flies like a dream, and you add boosters... do you get the aerospace equivalent of Inception?

Explosive Philosophies - Brought to you by Veto Aerospace

I\'m RedDwarfIV. Welcome to the Forum.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
